author: entertainment.ie
title: MovieNews | Matthew McConaughey looks REALLY different on the set of his new film
text:
The Oscar winning actor is no stranger to changing his body drastically for a role.
McConaughey is starring in the new film Gold, where he plays an businessman who travels to the Indonesian jungle in search of some, eh, gold. We see what they did there.
He had previously lost over 3 stone for his work in Dallas Buyers Club and that won him an Oscar. A long way away from the likes of Fool's Gold and whatnot. Where he spent an entire production not wearing a shirt - to box office success, it has to be said.
. @McConaughey goes for a rather different look on the set of 'Gold in Manhattan' http://t.co/QWlr5AWXAv pic.twitter.com/5RvMoD2f57
â€” REX (@rexfeatures) October 5, 2015
 Stephen Gaghan, who directed George Clooney to an Oscar in Syrinana is calling the shots.
